item.text: Now Dinah, Leah’s daughter whom she bore to Jacob, went to meet the young women of the land.

When <st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02544" class="">Hamor</st> the <st data-num="02340" class="">Hivite</st>, who <st data-num="05387" class="">ruled</st> that <st data-num="0776" class="">area</st>, <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> her, he <st data-num="03947" class="">grabbed</st> her, <st data-num="07901" class="">forced himself</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">on</st> her,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06031" class="">sexually assaulted</st> her.<n id="2" />

Then <st data-num="05315" class="">he</st> became <st data-num="01692" class="">very attached</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="01783" class="">Dinah</st>, <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>. He <st data-num="0157" class="">fell in love with</st> the <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="05921 03820">romantically</st> to <st data-num="05291" class="">her</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="0559 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="02544" class="">Hamor</st>, “<st data-num="03947" class="">Acquire</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03207" class="">young girl</st> as my <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>.”<n id="1" />
When Jacob heard that Shechem had violated his daughter Dinah, his sons were with the livestock in the field. So Jacob remained silent until they came in.
Then Shechem’s father Hamor went to speak with Jacob about Dinah.

Now Jacob’s sons had come in from the field when they heard the news. They were offended and very angry because Shechem had disgraced Israel by sexually assaulting Jacob’s daughter, a crime that should not be committed.
But Hamor made this appeal to them: “My son Shechem is in love with your daughter. Please give her to him as his wife.

<st data-num="02859" class="">Intermarry</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> us.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05414" class="">Let</st> us <st data-num="05414" class="">marry</st> your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>, and <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> our <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">as wives</st> for yourselves.<n id="2" />
You may live among us, and the land will be open to you. Live in it, travel freely in it, and acquire property in it.”
Then Shechem said to Dinah’s father and brothers, “Let me find favor in your sight, and whatever you require of me I’ll give.
You can make the bride price and the gift I must bring very expensive, and I’ll give whatever you ask of me. Just give me the young woman as my wife!”
Jacob’s sons answered Shechem and his father Hamor deceitfully when they spoke because Shechem had violated their sister Dinah.

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “We <st data-num="03808 03201">cannot</st> <st data-num="06213 01697 02088 05414">give</st><n id="1" /> our <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> to a <st data-num="0582" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="06190" class="">not circumcised</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> would be a <st data-num="02781" class="">disgrace</st><n id="2" /> to us.

We will <st data-num="0225" class="">give</st> you our <st data-num="0225" class="">consent</st> on <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0389" class="">one condition</st>: You <st data-num="0518" class="">must</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03644" class="">like</st> us by <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcising</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="02145" class="">males</st>.

Then we will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st><n id="1" /> you our <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">to marry</st>,<n id="2" /> and we will <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">as wives</st> for ourselves, and we will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">among</st> you and <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.
But if you do not agree to our terms by being circumcised, then we will take our sister and depart.”
Their offer pleased Hamor and his son Shechem.

The <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0309" class="">delay</st> in <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">what</st> they <st data-num="01697" class="">asked</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="02654" class="">wanted</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> Dinah<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02654" class="">badly</st>. (Now <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="03513" class="">more important</st><n id="3" /> than <st data-num="03605" class="">anyone</st> in his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>.)<n id="4" />

So <st data-num="02544" class="">Hamor</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st><n id="1" /> of their <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="01696 0559">spoke</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> of their <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>,

“<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">are</st> at <st data-num="08003" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> us. So let them <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="05503" class="">travel freely in</st> it, for the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">is</st> <st data-num="07342" class="">wide</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">enough</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06440">for</st> them. We will <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> their <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> for <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>, and we will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> them our <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">to marry</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0389" class="">Only</st> on <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> one <st data-num="02063" class="">condition</st> will these <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0225" class="">consent</st> to <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> us and <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people:</st> They demand<n id="1" /> that <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> among us be <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcised</st> just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcised</st>.
If we do so, won’t their livestock, their property, and all their animals become ours? So let’s consent to their demand, so they will live among us.”
All the men who assembled at the city gate agreed with Hamor and his son Shechem. Every male who assembled at the city gate was circumcised.

In <st data-num="07992" class="">three</st> <st data-num="01961 03117">days</st>, when they <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> still <st data-num="03510" class="">in pain</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st> and <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st>, <st data-num="01783" class="">Dinah’s</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> his <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0983" class="">unsuspecting</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="02026" class="">slaughtered</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st>.

They <st data-num="02026" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="02544" class="">Hamor</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="01783" class="">Dinah</st> from <st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and <st data-num="03318" class="">left</st>.

<st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="0935 05921 02491">killed</st> them<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0962" class="">looted</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">because</st> their <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> had been <st data-num="02930" class="">violated</st>.<n id="2" />

They <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> their <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st>, <st data-num="01241" class="">herds</st>, and <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st>, as well as <st data-num="0834" class="">everything</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">and</st> in the surrounding <st data-num="07704" class="">fields</st>.<n id="1" />
They captured as plunder all their wealth, all their little ones, and their wives, including everything in the houses.

Then Jacob said to Simeon and Levi, “You have brought ruin on me by making me a foul odor among the inhabitants of the land—among the Canaanites and the Perizzites. I am few in number; they will join forces against me and attack me, and both I and my family will be destroyed!”
But Simeon and Levi replied, “Should he treat our sister like a common prostitute?”
